About Us

This is what I do.

        Hi, rave babes! I’m Brittany Provost. I’m an EDM Journalist who not only leaves my heart and soul on the dance floor, but also in my body of work. My mission with my projects is to eliminate the stigmas often associated with the rave scene, and emphasize the individuals within our community. Whether it’s through an article and/or a post on social media, my goal has always been to shine the spotlight on all of the people, places and things in the realm of dance music.

There’s so much more than meets the eye; it’s important to highlight what it’s all about… Simply put, our scene is amazing – it’s time to Rave About It! My love of dance music dates back to hearing my dad blasting Armin van Buuren’s tracks while I was in my mom’s womb. That said, it wasn’t until I attended my first EDM event in 2013 that my passion became evident. From that moment on, I did everything in my power to fully immerse myself into our dynamic community and its admirable culture. In 2017, I landed my first job as an EDM Journalist, covering events, interviewing artists and much more. Since then, I’ve explored various interests such as digital marketing and event planning, while working with different dance music companies and related enthusiasts. Today, I am proud to look back on 1,000+ published articles, 30+ exclusive interviews, 3 successful events in 2022, and arguably my most precious accomplishment to date, the launch of my own company ‘Rave About It’ during the Summer of 2022.

Unquestionably, music is a powerful tool that can bring individuals together. I aspire that my undertakings has this same effect, and continues to empower others to convey the values embedded within our community. If you ask me, there’s no limit to what we can accomplish together, and that’s a beautiful reality to actively explore! I often remind myself of my place in the cosmos. With music as my guide, I believe it will continue to lead me towards my purpose in life. I hope you’ll join me on my journey; intriguingly, it’s possible we’ll discover what motivates you along the way as well! I’m eager to continue to collaborate with likeminded creators and attain my ultimate mission. In the meantime, I will forever cherish the moments I’ve lived thanks to dance music, including meeting many of my closest friends and becoming my true self. The future is bright; let’s shine the light on everything that sparkles in our scene!
